Key Match Events: The Grizzlies suffered one of their worst defeats of the season in Sunday's 130-106 loss to the Thunder (26-5)
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Taylor Jenkins has said Morant is dealing with soreness and that Edey woke up the day after Friday's game in New Orleans with concussion-related symptoms
Post-Match Reflections: Jenkins vowed the team would adapt and adjust to stay on track the rest of this trip
Jackson agreed with Jenkins assessment, stating 'We're in it now. We're in the hard part of the season, on the road going up against tough teams. You just have to go out there and hoop.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies activated second-round pick Cam Spencer and recalled two-way prospects Yuki Kawamura and Colin Castleton from their G League Memphis Hustle assignments
The Grizzlies have been active in trade talks in hopes of bolstering the roster and solidifying its status as a top contender in the conference
Others: The Grizzlies have the NBA's third-highest turnover percentage (16.3%), commits the second-most turnovers per game (17.2) and yields the second-most points off turnovers (22.2)
